meanings.definition: Tanzanites: a blue or violet gemstone
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful tanzanites necklace to the party.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler displayed various tanzanites in the store window.
meanings.sent3: The tanzanites sparkled like tiny stars in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone like tanzanites in the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent5: The tanzanites glowed with an ethereal light, captivating all who saw them.

meanings.definition: Tanzanites: plural form of tanzanite, referring to multiple gemstones of this type
meanings.sent1: He collected rare tanzanites from different parts of the world.
meanings.sent2: The exhibit showcased a dazzling array of tanzanites.
meanings.sent3: The tanzanites chattered happily among themselves in the jewelry box.
meanings.sent4: The field of tanzanites stretched out before her like a sea of color.
meanings.sent5: The tanzanites twinkled like a galaxy of stars in the night sky.
